Santa_Clarita.Bouquet Canyon, California:
Bouquet Canyon, also known as Hangman's Canyon and Dead Man's Canyon, is an unincorporated community located in Los Angeles County, California.


== Description ==
Bouquet Canyon is one of many canyons branching from the Santa Clarita Valley in Los Angeles County, whose streams feed the Santa Clara River. The canyon's main stream, Bouquet Creek, begins in the Sierra Pelona Mountains, near Leona Valley.
